caption.p: Effect of plantain bulb extract-beverage-blend on pancreatic α-amylase and intestinal α-glucosidase activities of streptozotocin (STZ)-induced diabetic rats. Bars represent mean±SEM (n=7). Values are statistically different at *** P<0.001 vs NC; ### P<0.001 vs STZ-IND; † P<0.05 vs STZ+ACA. Group abbreviations are the same as Table 1.
